instruction: Create a character sketch of Luke Skywalker
output: Luke Skywalker is a tall and well-built young man with blond hair and blue eyes. He has a strong sense of justice and is a natural leader who has a way of inspiring loyalty and bringing out the best in those around him. He is a compassionate soul and a gifted Jedi who is willing to make difficult decisions for the greater good of the universe. He is brave and wise beyond his years, with a noble spirit and the courage to stand up for what is right.
